sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ReferralServiceService } from '../services/referral-service.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-referral', templateUrl: './referral.component.html', styleUrls: ['./referral.component.scss'] }) export class ReferralComponent implements OnInit{ contacts :any ngOnInit(): void { this.service.get_contacts().subscribe(res => this.contacts = res) console.log(this.contacts, '#contacts') } constructor (private service: ReferralServiceService) {} referral_credit: Number = 7 current_user: string = "Your friend's name" referrer_name: string = "referrer's name" referral_link: string = "referral link" company_name: string = "company's name" company_web_address: string = "company's website address" review_image: string = "./../../assets/images/Design inspiration-bro.png" review_link: string = "" program_description: string = "" program_starting_date: string = "" program_due_date: string = "" program_period: Number = 180 program_reward: string = "Referral Program Rewards" } Document

Referral Form
